atk-s0510a3:8_1: He then got up from his seat and went to the park at Sāvatthī, where he approached the Buddha, Komārabhacca, and gave him a hundred leagues, following the way that , and made a dreadful racket. After hearing about his dwelling, he walked around Sāvatthī, returned to his dwelling place for the Buddha.
atk-s0510a3:8_2: is quite enough for Subhūti that this dwelling, the master builds upwards, and then listens with the teaching.
atk-s0510a3:8_3: If one who is fully ordained should do two layers and speak in the wilderness, then in remote lodgings, not liable to grow old. Lying in the wilderness, he struck it with a point to perfection, and he cuts it down.
atk-s0510a3:9_0: When he teaches Dhamma, he’s attached to sandals, not holding a lamp, and that’s why he’s born in order to give them a dwelling—this is called “a”.
atk-s0510a3:9_1: But because they walked for alms, but after getting up for alms. Then, after carrying their loud no longer around it, they get by not a donor is called the chief queen.’
atk-s0510a3:9_2: (The Buddha should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
atk-s0510a3:9_3: Next there are buyingtoms, standing on the bank of the river Aciravatī.
atk-s0510a3:9_4: In the same way, that great dancers of the native spirits removed the crystal trees in the world. Traveling and continued existence, when they attained to the country and left to Rājagaha.
